course_title: Nursing Care of the Oncology Patient
course_description: This course prepares nursing students to care for the person with cancer and their families. Focus is on the most common cancers in adults and addresses prevention, early detection, diagnosis, treatment, symptom management, QOL issues, and health disparities on oncology outcomes.
sections: Class Nbr: 1708, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 1-3:20p, Instructor: T. Ades, Status: Open
